File: Test/testConfig/index.js

'use-strict';

var _       = require('lodash');
var winston = require('winston');

var allFile        = require('./config/all.json');
var commonConfFile = require('./config/common.json');

var PATH_CONF_DEVELOPPEMENT = './config/developpement.json';
var PATH_CONF_STAGING       = './config/staging.json';
var PATH_CONF_PRODUCTION    = './config/production.json';

var confFinal = {}; // Main conf object

var logger  = new (winston.Logger)( {
    transports : [
      new (winston.transports.Console)( {
          colorize : true
          }),
      ]
});



main();

function main () {

    preProcess('developpement');

}

/**
 * prepocess run process with the good configuration file
 * @param {String} mode type of configuration (Eg. 'developpement', 'staging', 'production')
 */
function preProcess( mode ) {
    switch (mode) {
        case 'developpement':
            processConf(PATH_CONF_DEVELOPPEMENT);
            break;
        case 'staging':
            processConf(PATH_CONF_STAGING);
            break;
        case 'production':
            processConf(PATH_CONF_PRODUCTION);
            break;
        default:

    }
}

/**
 * Compare each block of params in all.json and 'typeConf.json' and add them to configFinal
 * @param {[String]} path Path of file configuration
 */
function processConf( path ) {
    var file = require ( path);

    confFinal.db     = getParamsDb(file);
    confFinal.mailer = getParamsMailer(file);
    confFinal.logger = getParamsLogger(file);
    confFinal.express = getParamsExpress(file);

    //Display conf just for test
    displayConf(confFinal);
}

/**
 * Compare data into block 'db' in typeConf.json' and all.json and if is different we save typeConf' param
 * @param {Sting} file file 'typeConf.json'
 * @return object with all params of this block
 */
function getParamsDb(file) {
    var paramsDb = {};

    _.forEach( allFile.db, function(val, key) {
        newVal = findValue( file.db, key);
        // logger.info( '-- key : ' + key + ',  value : ' + val + ', newVal : ' + newVal  );
        if ( _.isEmpty(newVal) ){
            paramsDb[key] = val;
        }
        else {
            paramsDb[key] = newVal;
        }
    });
    return paramsDb;
}

/**
 * Compare data into block 'mailer' in typeConf.json' and all.json and if is different we save typeConf' param
 * @param {Sting} file file 'typeConf.json'
 * @return object with all params of this block
 */
function getParamsMailer(file) {
    var paramsMailer = {};
    _.forEach( allFile.mailer, function(val, key) {
        newVal = findValue( file.mailer, key);
        // logger.info( '-- key : ' + key + ',  value : ' + val + ', newVal : ' + newVal  );
        if ( _.isEmpty(newVal) ){
            paramsMailer[key] = val;
        }
        else {
            paramsMailer[key] = newVal;
        }
    });
    return paramsMailer;

}

/**
 * Compare data into block 'logger' in typeConf.json' and all.json and if is different we save typeConf' param
 * @param {Sting} file file 'typeConf.json'
 * @return object with all params of this block
 */
function getParamsLogger(file) {
    var paramsLogger = {};
    _.forEach( allFile.logger, function(val, key) {
        newVal = findValue( file.logger, key);
    //    logger.info( '-- key : ' + key + ',  value : ' + val + ', newVal : ' + newVal  );

        if ( _.isEmpty(newVal) ){
            paramsLogger[key] = val;
        }
        else {
            paramsLogger[key] = newVal;
        }
    });
    return paramsLogger;
}

/**
 * Compare data into block 'express' in typeConf.json' and all.json and if is different we save typeConf' param
 * @param {Sting} file file 'typeConf.json'
 * @return object with all params of this block
 */
function getParamsExpress ( file) {
    var paramsExpress = {};
    _.forEach( allFile.express, function(val, key) {
        newVal = findValue( file.express, key);
        if ( _.isEmpty(newVal) ){
            paramsExpress[key] = val;
        }
        else {
            paramsExpress[key] = newVal;
        }
    });
    return paramsExpress;
}

/**
 * Find a value into a json array by is key
 *
 * @param {[type]} array     [description]
 * @param {[type]} keyToFind [description]
 */
function findValue ( array, keyToFind) {
    var valueToRuturn;
    _.forEach( array, function(value, key) {
        if( keyToFind === key ) {
            valueToRuturn = value;
        }
    });
    return valueToRuturn  ;
}

/**
 * Display conf just for testing
 * @param {[type]} array [description]
 */
function displayConf ( array ) {
    logger.info("|-----------------|");
    logger.info("|---DisplayConf---|");
    logger.info("|-----------------|");


    _.forEach( array, function( value , key) {
        logger.info( '--- ' + key +' :' );

        logger.info( value);

    });

    logger.info( 'name db : ' + confFinal.db.name);
    logger.info( 'confFinal.express.vhost.http.redirect.port : ' + confFinal.express.vhost.http.redirect.port);

}





module.exports = confFinal;
